movie.title: One Chance
movie.plot: This film follows the remarkable and inspirational true story of Paul Potts, a shy, bullied shop assistant by day and an amateur opera singer by night.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 3 wins & 4 nominations.

events.title: Paul Potts wins Britain's Got Talent
